column4: In my conky config im catting a text file (its a todo list) but i cant get it to show more than 10 lines, here is my current config http://linuxcranks.pastebin.com/m2bd1910f anyone have any ideas?
check the conky homepage/configs - they got examples of doing that stuff..  you may need to set the  min/max sizes of the 'conky' window manually
i do a similer thing with log files.
my old conky config fit the whole screen and i just removed some of the sections, shouldnt the window size still be the same (and how are you starting multiple conkies?)
